| Krajina Serb Democratic Party (SDS) | Not specified in the text | Cannot determine |

Based on the provided text, it is not explicitly stated where the Serb Radical Party (SRS) and the Krajina Serb Democratic Party (SDS) are headquartered or primarily operate. The Assembly's location is also not explicitly stated, but Beli Manastir is mentioned in relation to the election of Branko Vojnic, implying that the Assembly may have some connection to that location. However, without further information, it is not possible to definitively determine the relationships between these organizations and their locations.
